stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  HILARIOUS
comments: Cool guy, laid-back (but don\'t expect to be able to slack off), fair, pretty funny, and really knows his stuff. The class is pretty time-consuming, but its also pretty interesting and useful material, and he\'s really helpful in the lab; plus, his class\'s critique days were one of the only ones that I didn\'t absolutely hate. Definitely recommend.

The class is pretty time-consuming, but it was pretty interesting and useful material, and he\'s really helpful in the lab; also, his class was one of the only ones with critique days I didn\'t absolutely hate. tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)
comments: He\'s clear about what he wants, gives you plenty of time for projects as well as advice for how to approach them, references artists you can look at to help your ideas. He\'s very knowledgable. As long as you put in the time, it\'s a very manageable class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (3)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Great class, great professor, great time! Anderson is the coolest. He\'s honorable, honest, and genuinely cares about his students. I highly recommend his class and his perspective on art.
